review: Excellent movie, Akki is really talented actor. Haan Maine Bhi Pyaar Kiya  is one of the best movie of Akshay Kumar. Songs are really heart touching. Karishma, Abhishek are also performed well. Udit Narayan,  Kumar Sanu alka yagnik.... All singers in the movie makes this movie more attractive. My favourite movie.
